thread.title: Crimson Peak flops as Goosebumps wins the US box office with $23.5m - Movies
thread.title_full: Crimson Peak flops as Goosebumps wins the US box office with $23.5m - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Crimson Peak flops as Goosebumps wins the US box office with $23.5m - Movies
text: Jack Black's Goosebumps has taken $23.5m in its opening weekend to go straight to the top of the US box office.The film knocked The Martian off the top spot, while Crimson Peak was less than impressive in its opening weekend. Â© Sony Pictures / Hopper StoneGoosebumps The Martian is down to 2 with $21.5m, while Steven Spielberg's Cold War drama Bridge of Spies is in at 3 with $15.3m.Meanwhile, Tom Hiddleston's Crimson Peak is at 4 with a disappointing $12.8m. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4440113536001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14440113536001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4440113536001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4440113536001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14440113536001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4440113536001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Hotel Transylvania 2 is at 5 with $12.5m, Hugh Jackman's Pan is at 6 with $5.8m and The Intern is at 7 with $5.4m.Finally, Sicario is at 8 with $4.5m, new entry Woodlawn is at 9 with $4.1m and Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials rounds out the top ten with $2.7m. Sicario The US weekend box office top 10 for October 16-18 (studio estimates) is as follows:1. (-) Goosebumps - $23,500,0002. (1) The Martian - $21,500,0003. (-) Bridge of Spies - $15,380,0004. (-) Crimson Peak - $12,850,0005. (2) Hotel Transylvania 2 - $12,250,0006. (3) Pan - $5,860,0007. (4) The Intern - $5,405,000 8. (5) Sicario - $4,500,0009. (-) Woodlawn - $4,100,00010. (6) Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials - $2,750,000
